lyric:
[00:01.500]The sound of silence-Simon & Garfunkel
[00:03.570]Hello darkness my old friend.
[00:07.190]I've come 2 talk with U again.
[00:11.670]Because a vision softly creeping.
[00:15.380]Left its seeds while I was sleeping.
[00:20.940]And the vision that was planted in my brain.
[00:26.630]Still remains.
[00:31.410]Within the sound of silence
[00:36.960]In restless dreams I walk alone.
[00:41.540]Narrow streets of cobble stone.
[00:45.960]'Neath the halo of a street lamp.
[00:50.280]I turned my collar 2 the cold & damp.
[00:55.030]When my eyes were stabbled by the flash of a neon light.
[01:02.130]That split the night.
[01:05.880]And touched the sound of silence.
[01:11.160]And in the naked night I saw.
[01:15.650]Ten thousand people maybe more.
[01:20.800]People talking without speaking.
[01:24.850]People hearing without listening.
[01:29.500]People writing songs that voices never share.
[01:36.920]And no one dare.
[01:40.280]Disturb the sound of silence.
[01:46.390]"Fool" said I "U do not know."
[01:50.580]"Silence like a cancer grows."
[01:54.860]Hear my words that I might teach U."
[01:59.500]"Take my arms that I might reach U."
[02:03.670]But my words like silent rain-drops fell.
[02:13.080]And echoed in the wells of silence.
[02:20.500]And the people bow & prayed.
[02:24.780]To the neon God they made.
[02:28.970]And the sign flash out its warning.
[02:33.520]In the words that it was forming
[02:37.800]And the sign said "The words of the prophers.
[02:41.520]Are written the subway walls & tenement halls".
[02:48.710]And whispered in the sounds of silence.
tlyric:
[00:01.500]寂然之声 西蒙&加丰凯尔
[00:03.570]嘿,黑夜啊,我的老友
[00:07.190]我又来找你聊天了
[00:11.670]因为有个幻影轻轻爬进来
[00:15.380]趁我熟睡时暗暗播下了种子
[00:20.940]使这个幻影深植入我脑海中
[00:26.630]萦绕盘旋不去
[00:31.410]在寂静无声的此刻
[00:36.960]在无数不平静的梦中我茕茕独行
[00:41.540]行走在鹅卵石铺成狭窄街道上
[00:45.960]头顶上街灯的光晕将我笼罩
[00:50.280]我竖起衣领以抗御这湿冷的夜
[00:55.030]当我的眼睛为刺眼的霓虹灯闪烁所迷时
[01:02.130]霓虹灯的闪烁也划破了夜空
[01:05.880]打破了黑夜的沉静
[01:11.160]在无遮灯照耀下我看到
[01:15.650]人头攒动
[01:20.800]有的人在说着无聊的话语
[01:24.850]有的人在漫不经心的听着别人说
[01:29.500]有的人在写着那些从不会被传唱的歌
[01:36.920]但没有人敢于去
[01:40.280]打破这份静默
[01:46.390]我说道:"愚蠢的人啊,你们不知道
[01:50.580]静默会像癌细胞那样扩散
[01:54.860]听我的话,我才能教导你
[01:59.500]抓紧我的手,我才能救你
[02:03.670]但是我的话却如寂静无声的雨点落下
[02:13.080]徒然回响在沉静的井里
[02:20.500]人们仍然顶礼膜拜着
[02:24.780]自己塑造的霓虹灯神文明
[02:28.970]霓虹灯以它闪烁的文字显出其预兆
[02:33.520]警告的话语渐渐成型
[02:37.800]预兆显示:先知的话语
[02:41.520]已被写在地铁的墙上以及出租公寓的走廊上
[02:48.710]也在无声的静默中被轻声传送
